entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Leamington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:14 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.2°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
